page.title: 10MOSQUE AFTER SCHOOL,PRESTON
page.content: From Monday to Friday we have to go to the{Mosque}at 5:00 p.m.On Monday at the Mosque, we have to go in and go to our class and sit in our place.We have to start praying as soon as we sit. When our teacher comes he sits down.We move to different classes each year. These are some rules:we can't look up at anyone coming in at the door; we've got to sort of kneel and sit;we have to pray the holy{Koran}quickly without mistake.Our teacher listens to us all. Then we pray our Khitabh.From the Khitabh we get some homework to learn for the next day.After, we pray more things by heart. On other days it's just the same. Except on Friday when our nails should be cut and we have to take our fees. We do Urdu homework as well. We finish at 7:30 p.m.We go out of the Mosque to wait for our lifts home.
